divs: sighting detailsi was driving 3\4 miles north of the "old st. george's" bridge on rt. 13. i looked up and saw a cigar shaped object with 3 lights, as i got closer to the object, which was slowly moving southwest, i was able to make out windows in the object. there was no audible noise. my friend called my cell phone just as i saw the object, i told him what was going on and he told me to double back. i did, the slow moving object was gone; however, i saw what appeared to be planes or helicopters now in the distance. i continued on my original course, and again the same\duplicate object appeared in the same fashion. this time i drove directly under it. no noise, moving at relativity low speed 50mph, approx. 200 - 500 feet in the air, approx 70 - 90 feet long. gray in color, cigar shaped. i'm not sure what i saw, my friend was on the phone the whole time, i don't have a camera so i couldn't capture it. dover afb is located roughly 30 miles south of my position. could these have been planes on a mission? i've never seen planes move so slowly, without noise. definitely freaked me out. i'm no saying it was alien, but it was an object i can't easily identify. hopefully someone can find out. this must have been seen by others, since rt 1 (a busy highway) runs directly parallel with my position.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Delaware
There were no other sightings in Delaware on or around March 9th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
